summary: Completed testing of 3 new features for Honey Farm e-commerce app: Categories drag & drop, Orders display with products, and WhatsApp/Telegram notification without '⚠️ ВАЖНО' text. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Categories have 'order' field and are sorted by it
Backend: Orders contain items array with name, weight, price, quantity
Frontend: Categories page shows drag handles (FaGripVertical icons)
Frontend: Categories page shows 'Перетащите для изменения порядка' instruction
Frontend: Categories are numbered 1-6 in correct order
Frontend: DragDropContext from @hello-pangea/dnd is properly integrated
Frontend: HomePage category filter shows categories in correct order
Frontend: Orders page (Данные) shows customer name and phone
Frontend: Orders page shows products list with name, weight, quantity, price
Frontend: Orders page shows total sum and discount
Frontend: Orders page shows promocode badge or 'Без промокода'
Frontend: WhatsApp notification modal does NOT contain '⚠️ ВАЖНО'
Frontend: Telegram notification modal does NOT contain '⚠️ ВАЖНО'
Frontend: Notification modals show 'Заказ сформирован!' title
Frontend: Notification modals show redirect countdown
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test orders for testing orders display, cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 requested features are working: 1) Categories drag & drop with @hello-pangea/dnd library, 2) Orders display with products list format, 3) WhatsApp/Telegram notifications without '⚠️ ВАЖНО' text. Backend reorder endpoint tested via API. Frontend drag & drop UI verified visually.

categories_drag_drop.details: DragDropContext implemented with @hello-pangea/dnd, drag handles visible, instruction text present, backend reorder endpoint works

orders_products_display.details: Orders show: Name, Phone, Products list (name, weight, quantity, price), Sum, Promo code

notification_no_vazhno.details: Both WhatsApp and Telegram notification modals do NOT contain '⚠️ ВАЖНО' text
